title: Amundsen
description: Film drama that tells the life story of Norwegian polar explorer Roald Amundsen.
synopsis_small: Film drama that tells the life story of Norwegian polar explorer Roald Amundsen.
synopsis_medium: Film drama that tells the life story of explorer Roald Amundsen, whose obsession with conquering both poles came at a cost - to family and colleagues alike.
synopsis_large: Inspired by a gift from his father when he was a child, Roald Amundsen became fascinated by the polar wildernesses. It was an obsession that drove to him explore both poles. He led the first expedition to the South Pole in 1911 as well as the first proven to have reached the North Pole, in a dirigible, in 1926. His achievements, however, came at a cost to both his family and his colleagues. In Norwegian and English with English subtitles.

synopsis_medium: When 12-year-old Kingsley is transferred to a special-needs school, a group of women uncover an unofficial segregation policy preventing many black children from receiving the education they deserve.
synopsis_large: When 12-year-old Kingsley is transferred to a special-needs school, a group of West Indian women uncover an unofficial segregation policy preventing many black children from receiving the education they deserve.

title: Apostasy

synopsis_medium: Drama. Alex, a faithful member of the Jehovah's Witness congregation in Oldham, is challenged when her sister transgresses and is barred from the faith.
synopsis_large: Just turned 18, Alex, a faithful member of the Jehovah's Witness congregation in Oldham, is challenged when her sister transgresses and is barred from the faith.Part of the British Film Premiere season from BBC Film and the BFI.

title: Bill
rating_description: mild bad language, sex references, violence
description: Bill Shakespeare (Matthew Baynton) leaves Stratford to follow his dream.
synopsis_small: Bill Shakespeare (Matthew Baynton) leaves Stratford to follow his dream.
synopsis_medium: Family comedy from the performers of Horrible Histories. Young Bill Shakespeare leaves Stratford to follow his latest dream, to be a playwright in London.
synopsis_large: 1593. While King Philip of Spain plots to kill Queen Elizabeth of England, young Bill Shakespeare leaves Stratford to follow his latest dream, to be a playwright in London - despite the theatres being closed due to plague. Luckily the Queen desires a new play - unluckily she chooses creepy Lord Crawley to write it.

title: The Titfield Thunderbolt
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, The Titfield Thunderbolt
description: Ealing comedy about a villages battle to save their railway line. With Stanley Holloway.
synopsis_small: Ealing comedy about a village's battle to save their railway line. With Stanley Holloway.
synopsis_medium: Ealing comedy about a group of villagers who battle to preserve the local railway line by running it themselves, until they are sabotaged in a midnight raid by a rival bus company.
synopsis_large: Ealing comedy about a group of villagers and their battle to preserve the local railway line by running it themselves, an enterprise that goes well until they are sabotaged in a midnight raid by the rival bus company. Undaunted, they wheel out the Thunderbolt, an ancient exhibit in the village museum. Now all that remains is to put on a satisfactory run for the stickler of a government inspector.

title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
description: The heroine races against time to find a relic before it falls into the wrong hands.
synopsis_small: The heroine races against time to find a relic before it falls into the wrong hands.
synopsis_medium: Action tale adapted from the popular video game in which the eponymous heroine (Angelina Jolie) races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands.
synopsis_large: Action tale adapted from the popular video game in which the eponymous heroine races against time to find an ancient relic before it falls into the wrong hands. Leaving behind her life of luxury, the highly trained adventurer travels to exotic and dangerous locales, where she battles a variety of fantastical creatures in the knowledge that the fate of mankind rests in her hands.

title: The Keeper
description: At the end of WWII, Bert Trautmann stays in the UK for love and a football career.
synopsis_small: At the end of WWII, Bert Trautmann stays in the UK for love and a football career.
synopsis_medium: Recruited from the local prisoner-of-war camp by the manager of non-league St Helens, Bert Trautmann has to overcome the prejudices of his fellow team members.
synopsis_large: Recruited from the local prisoner-of-war camp by the manager of non-league St Helens, Bert Trautmann has to overcome the prejudices of his fellow team members who are all appalled at the prospect of playing with the enemy. At the end of the war, Bert is free to return to his home in Bremen, but his growing connection with Margaret, the boss's daughter, leads him to stay and pursue a career in professional football.

title: 20th Century Women
rating_description: strong sex references, strong language, drug misuse
description: A single mother persuades a friend to give her son some lessons in living life.
synopsis_small: A single mother persuades a friend to give her son some lessons in living life.
synopsis_medium: Single mother Dorothea is concerned about the lack of a male role model for her impressionable son and persuades teenage friend Julie to give him some lessons in living life as it should be lived.
synopsis_large: In Santa Barbara in 1979, 15-year-old Jamie lives with his single mother Dorothea in a shared house. Dorothea is concerned about the lack of a male role model for her impressionable son and persuades lodger Abbie and Jamie's teenage friend Julie to give him some lessons in living life as it should be lived.

title: Citizen Kane
description: The story of newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane, told in a series of flashbacks.
synopsis_small: The story of newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane, told in a series of flashbacks.
synopsis_medium: A landmark in the history of cinema, telling the story of newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane in a series of flashbacks. Starring Orson Welles.
synopsis_large: Frequently voted one of the best films ever made, Orson Welles's masterpiece tells the story of newspaper magnate Charles Foster Kane in a series of flashbacks. A reporter is intrigued by the dying Kane's last word - rosebud - and sets out to find a new angle on the life of one of the most powerful men in America. Nine Oscar nominations resulted in only one award for the outspoken Welles - Best Screenplay.

title: In the Heat of the Night
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, In the Heat of the Night
rating_description: moderate threat, sex references, racist language
description: A bigoted sheriff of a Mississippi town has to collaborate with a black detective.
synopsis_small: A bigoted sheriff of a Mississippi town has to collaborate with a black detective.
synopsis_medium: Thriller about the bigoted sheriff (Rod Steiger) of a small Mississippi town who finds himself forced into collaboration with a black detective (Sidney Poitier) from Philadelphia.
synopsis_large: Oscar-winning thriller about the bigoted sheriff in a small Mississippi cotton town who finds himself forced into collaboration with a black homicide expert from Philadelphia.Sparta, Mississippi is a small, quiet town broiling on a steamy September night. At the train station Virgil Tibbs, a solitary black man from out of town, is arrested for the murder of a rich northern industrialist. Police chief Gillespie has no experience of a murder inquiry and subjects Tibbs to a bigoted, insolent interrogation. But when Tibbs reveals himself to be a top city homicide cop, his is just the assistance Gillespie can do without.

title: My Feral Heart
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, My Feral Heart
rating_description: infrequent strong language, moderate sex references
description: A young man with Down’s syndrome is forced into a care home after the death of his mother.
synopsis_small: A young man with Down’s syndrome is forced into a care home after the death of his mother.
synopsis_medium: Film drama. Luke, a young man with Down’s syndrome who prizes his independence, is forced into a care home after his mother dies. There he makes friends with a mysterious girl.
synopsis_large: Luke, a young man with Down’s syndrome who prizes his independence, is forced into a care home after the death of his mother. There he rails against the restrictions imposed on him, but his frustrations are allayed by his budding friendships with his care worker Eve and a mysterious feral girl.

title: A Lonely Place to Die
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, A Lonely Place to Die
description: A group of mountaineers discover a Serbian girl held captive in the Scottish Highlands.
synopsis_small: A group of mountaineers discover a Serbian girl held captive in the Scottish Highlands.
synopsis_medium: A group of five mountaineers are hiking and climbing in the Scottish Highlands when they discover a young Serbian girl buried in a small chamber in the wilderness.
synopsis_large: A group of five mountaineers are hiking and climbing in the Scottish Highlands when they discover a young Serbian girl buried in a small chamber in the wilderness.They become caught up in a terrifying game of cat and mouse with the kidnappers as they try to get the girl to safety.

title: The Man in the White Suit
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, The Man in the White Suit
description: Ealing satire about a scientist (Alec Guinness) who invents an indestructible fibre.
synopsis_small: Ealing satire about a scientist (Alec Guinness) who invents an indestructible fibre.
synopsis_medium: Biting Ealing satire about a scientist (Alec Guinness) who invents an indestructible fibre but finds that everyone wants to destroy his formula.
synopsis_large: Biting Ealing satire about an eccentric research scientist working in a menial job in a textile factory, who invents a fabric that never gets dirty and never wears out. When the tycoons of the clothes industry discover his secret, they ruthlessly set out to destroy the formula, and the scientist is forced to go on the run, wearing a suit made from the miracle yarn, with just about everyone in pursuit.

title: Blind Ambition
rating_description: infrequent strong language, brief real violence
description: Myopic TV director Jamie O’Leary and blind comedian Jamie MacDonald meet blind artists.
synopsis_small: Myopic TV director Jamie O’Leary and blind comedian Jamie MacDonald meet blind artists.
synopsis_medium: TV director Jamie O’Leary faces eye surgery that could lead to sight loss. He goes on a journey with blind comedian Jamie MacDonald to see how blind artists achieve their vision.
synopsis_large: Jamie O’Leary has terrible sight, and is now facing eye surgery that could potentially lead to sight loss. A television director for almost 20 years, Jamie has produced groundbreaking programmes that take a fresh look at disability, as well as making popular travelogue shows with some of the UK’s funniest talent, including Karl Pilkington, Romesh Ranganathan and Katherine Ryan.At this pivotal point in his life, O’Leary wants to explore how people cope with sight loss and how blind artists achieve their creative vision of a world they see from a unique perspective. So he has hooked up with blind observational comedian Jamie MacDonald to bring light and shade to facing the condition. Together, they’re on a blind-leading-the-nearly-blind mission to uncover and collaborate with the best blind creative talent.

synopsis_large: Adaptation of LM Montgomery's Canadian classic following the adventures of determined, imaginative optimist Anne Shirley. Middle-aged brother and sister Matthew and Marilla Cuthbert want some help on the farm so they decide to adopt a boy. However, the orphanage sends them a girl by mistake.

synopsis_large: Following the story of Joan Stanley, a Cambridge science graduate who stole British nuclear secrets and passed them to the Soviet Union after WWII. Joan's espionage activities remained unknown for decades, until her cover was blown and MI5 finally caught up with her in her 80s.

synopsis_large: The action of a heated moment, when she lashes out in frustrated rage, is a turning point in the life of actress Valerie Stanton. She always wanted to play tragedy - but never meant it to be her own.

title: Versus - The Life and Films of Ken Loach
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, Versus - The Life and Films of Ken Loach
description: Ken Loach reflects on his career, with comments from colleagues, friends and family.
synopsis_small: Ken Loach reflects on his career, with comments from colleagues, friends and family.
synopsis_medium: Biographical documentary. Ken Loach reflects on his often controversial career, with comments from colleagues, friends and family.
synopsis_large: Ken Loach, who has been making socially aware dramas and documentaries for over 50 years, reflects on his often controversial career, with comments from colleagues, friends and family. Successes like Cathy Come Home, Kes and Palm d'Or winning The Wind that Shakes the Barley are matched by tales of projects shelved or pilloried, a stage play cancelled during rehearsals, and a personal tragedy.

synopsis_small: Holding a killer spells trouble for Sheriff Chance in a remote Texan town.
synopsis_medium: Characterful classic western. Holding a killer spells trouble for Sheriff Chance in a remote Texan town.
synopsis_large: Holding a killer spells trouble for Sheriff Chance in a remote Texan town. The jailed man’s brother has money and men, while Chance’s few allies include an alcoholic and a shady lady.Characterful classic western.

synopsis_small: A US cavalry officer suffers a setback on his last mission. Starring John Wayne.
synopsis_medium: Western drama with John Wayne as a US cavalry officer on his last duty before retiring, escorting two women civilians to a stagecoach. The second in John Ford's cavalry trilogy.
synopsis_large: In the second in John Ford's cavalry trilogy, a US cavalry officer suffers a setback on his last mission and is 'retired' before he can take further action. To avert a full-scale war, he decides to act alone.

title: Man on the Moon
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, Man on the Moon
description: Biopic of controversial comedian and star of Taxi and Saturday Night Live, Andy Kaufman.
synopsis_small: Biopic of controversial comedian and star of Taxi and Saturday Night Live, Andy Kaufman.
synopsis_medium: Biopic of controversial comedian Andy Kaufman. Star of Taxi and Saturday Night Live, Kaufman's unorthodox humour was often misunderstood. With Jim Carrey and Courtney Love.
synopsis_large: Biopic of controversial comedian Andy Kaufman, starring Jim Carrey. Star of Taxi and Saturday Night Live, Kaufman was a troubled individual for whom the boundaries of reality and stage performance were often blurred. Frequently misunderstood, even by those closest to him, he remained a strictly maverick entertainer until his untimely death from lung cancer in 1984.

title: Shaun the Sheep: The Flight Before Christmas
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, Shaun the Sheep: The Flight Before Christmas

synopsis_medium: It's Christmas Eve at Mossy Bottom Farm, but the seasonal excitement turns to dismay when Timmy inadvertently heads off to a Christmas market in the back of the farmer's truck.
synopsis_large: It's Christmas Eve at Mossy Bottom Farm, but Shaun's seasonal excitement turns to dismay when a farmhouse raid to get bigger stockings inadvertently leads to Timmy heading off to a Christmas market in the back of the farmer's truck. Shaun mounts a rescue mission to the local town.

title: Tycoon

synopsis_small: Romantic melodrama about an engineer battling to build a railroad and save his marriage.
synopsis_medium: Romantic melodrama about an engineer, played by John Wayne, battling to build a railroad in the Andes while trying to save his marriage to the boss's daughter.
synopsis_large: Romantic melodrama about an engineer battling to build a railroad in the Andes while trying to save his marriage to the boss's daughter. After wedding his bride against her father's wishes, he then jeopardises his marriage and the railroad enterprise by single-mindedly battling to get the extraordinary engineering project completed on time and within budget.

title: Blackbeard the Pirate
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, Blackbeard the Pirate
description: Swashbuckling adventure set on the high seas in the 17th century. Starring Robert Newton.
synopsis_small: Swashbuckling adventure set on the high seas in the 17th century. Starring Robert Newton.
synopsis_medium: Swashbuckler set on the high seas in the 17th century. Edward Maynard sets out to claim a fortune by posing as a surgeon on Blackbeard's ship.
synopsis_large: Swashbuckling adventure set on the high seas in the 17th century, when the Spanish Main was plagued with piracy. The English monarch, enraged by the infamous buccaneer Blackbeard's interference with legitimate commerce, dispatches Sir Henry Morgan to confront the pirate and his crew of cut-throats. But having kidnapped Sir Henry's bride, Blackbeard now holds a worthwhile hostage.

synopsis_small: Unconventional western about the life of legendary outlaw Billy the Kid.
synopsis_medium: Unconventional western about the life of outlaw Billy the Kid, including his partnership with Doc Holliday and clashes with lawman Pat Garrett. Stars Jane Russell and Jack Buetel.

title: Effie Gray
description: Dakota Fanning stars as Effie Gray, who at 19 became the wife of John Ruskin (Greg Wise).
synopsis_small: Dakota Fanning stars as Effie Gray, who at 19 became the wife of John Ruskin (Greg Wise).
synopsis_medium: Drama based on a true story. When young Effie Gray becomes the wife of John Ruskin, it soon becomes apparent that Ruskin regards her as a muse rather than a wife.
synopsis_large: When young Effie Gray becomes the wife of John Ruskin, one of the most distinguished writers and critics of the day, who has known her since her childhood, it soon becomes apparent that Ruskin regards her as a muse rather than a wife, and the stifling atmosphere of their home and Ruskin's overbearing wealthy parents soon take a toll on Effie's health. A trip back to Scotland for Ruskin to have his portrait painted by his protege John Everett Millais increases the distance between husband and wife, but the sympathy shown by Millais begins to offer her a release.

title: The Curse of the Cat People
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, The Curse of the Cat People
description: Film sequel. A lonely young girl conjures up the spirit of her fathers first wife.
synopsis_small: Film sequel. A lonely young girl conjures up the spirit of her father's first wife.
synopsis_medium: A lonely young girl conjures up the spirit of Irena - her father's first wife, a woman who believed herself to be descended from a cat.
synopsis_large: The follow-up to the seminal Cat People, this is the tale of a lonely young girl who conjures up the spirit of Irena - her father's first wife - to provide herself with a companion. But Irena believed herself to be descended from a race of cat people, and before long the fiendish feline is on the prowl again.

title: Wallace and Gromit: A Close Shave
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, Wallace and Gromit: A Close Shave
description: While Wallace is distracted by a romance, Gromit is framed for sheep rustling.
synopsis_small: While Wallace is distracted by a romance, Gromit is framed for sheep rustling.
synopsis_medium: Oscar-winning animated comedy thriller. While Wallace is distracted by a romance with the local wool shop owner, Gromit is framed for sheep rustling in a fiendish criminal plot.
synopsis_large: Oscar-winning claymation comedy thriller from Nick Park, featuring the popular inventor and his dog. Wallace's whirlwind romance with the proprietor of the local wool shop puts his head in a spin, and Gromit is framed for sheep rustling in a fiendish criminal plot, meeting a sheep named Shaun along the way. Will Wallace snap out of his daze in time to rescue his canine companion?

synopsis_small: A junior professor (Ian Carmichael) tries to impress the new university chancellor.
synopsis_medium: Comedy about a well-intentioned junior professor who hopes to impress the new university chancellor, but only succeeds in messing up everything he touches.
synopsis_large: Comedy about a well-intentioned junior history professor in an undistinguished university. Hoping to impress the new chancellor, he succeeds only in messing up everything he touches. Based on the satirical novel by Kingsley Amis.

synopsis_small: A family chauffeur becomes embroiled in the murderous schemes of his employer.
synopsis_medium: Chilling drama about a family chauffeur (Robert Mitchum) who gets embroiled in the murderous schemes of his employer, a beautiful female psychopath (Jean Simmons).

title: Run

synopsis_large: In the northern Scottish town of Fraserburgh, young men dream of escapism through late-night drag races. Finnie used to be one such lad, but now he works at the fish factory, and it's his son's turn to dream and race. Until one night when Finnie steals the boy's car for one last joyride. From BBC Films.

title: Young Ahmed
description: A Belgian teenager embraces an extremist interpretation of his faith.
synopsis_small: A Belgian teenager embraces an extremist interpretation of his faith.
synopsis_medium: Film drama. A Belgian teenager sets out to kill his school teacher after adopting an extremist interpretation of the Qur'an. In French and Arabic with English subtitles.

title: Mystify: Michael Hutchence
tags: BBC, iPlayer, TV, Mystify: Michael Hutchence
description: An intimate portrait of Michael Hutchence, lead singer of INXS.
synopsis_small: An intimate portrait of Michael Hutchence, lead singer of INXS.
synopsis_medium: A journey into the heart and soul of Michael Hutchence, internationally renowned lead-singer of INXS.
synopsis_large: A journey into the heart and soul of Michael Hutchence, internationally renowned lead-singer of INXS, a complex and shy man who spent the bulk of his life in the public eye, rarely revealing his true self to anyone except his very close friends. Rare archive footage and intimate insights from friends, lovers, family, colleagues and Michael Hutchence himself, portray his life from the beginning of his fractured family background to the peaks of rock stardom and down into the depths after a freak accident in Copenhagen removed his sense of taste and smell and seriously affected his ability to deal with his unravelling personal and professional life.A feature-length theatrical documentary written and directed by Richard Lowenstein, director of the majority of both INXS and Michael’s music videos and the 1986 feature film, Dogs in Space, in which Michael played the lead.

synopsis_medium: Scientists at a lonely Arctic outpost dig up an alien from the permafrost and face a desperate fight for their lives when it is accidentally thawed.
synopsis_large: Scientists at a lonely Arctic outpost dig up an alien from the permafrost and face a desperate fight for their lives when it is accidentally thawed.

title: Scottish Mussel

synopsis_small: A Glaswegian chancer goes undercover at a Highland conservation centre.
synopsis_medium: Ritchie is a Glaswegian chancer with low hopes and no prospects. Disillusioned with city life, he goes undercover at a Highland conservation centre to make his fortune.
synopsis_large: Ritchie is a Glaswegian chancer with low hopes and no prospects. Disillusioned with city life, he goes undercover at a Highland conservation centre to make his fortune as an illegal pearl fisher with the help of his two hapless and accident-prone friends Danny and Fraser. However, his plan goes awry when he falls for a a pretty English conservationist who is passionate about saving endangered mussels from the clutches of pearl thieves.

synopsis_large: Seeking figure-skating success, Tonya Harding instead finds notoriety in this darkly comic recreation of a sporting scandal. Featuring a multi-award-winning performance from Allison Janney.
